sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Bird Preserve Land Acquisition Act.

sections.heading: Consent of the State of Illinois is given to the United
sections.text:
States for the acquisition by purchase, gift or lease, of such areas of
land or water, or of land and water in Illinois, as the United States
may deem necessary for the establishment of preserves or reservations
for migratory birds, in accordance with the Act of Congress approved
February 18, 1929. The State of Illinois retains concurrent jurisdiction
with the United States over such areas in the matter of the service
thereon, of all civil and criminal process issuing under the authority
of the State of Illinois.
